mapper.select: select user_id, user_password, user_auth from user_info where user_id = #{userId} and user_password = #{userPassword}

select level, board_id, board_parentno, board_title, board_desc, board_time, u.user_id from board_info b, user_info u where b.user_id = u.user_id start with board_parentno = 0 connect by prior board_id = board_parentno order siblings by board_id desc
insert into board_info (board_id, user_id, board_parentno, board_title, board_desc, board_time) values(board_info_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{boardParentno}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardDesc}, sysdate)
select b.*, u.user_id from board_info b, user_info u where b.board_id = #{boardId} and b.user_id = u.user_id
